de.iss.mv2.security

Class PEMFileIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.security.PEMFileIO

  • public class PEMFileIO
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to read and write different PKCS entities from or to a stream.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer

    • Method Detail

      • readEncryptedKeyFile

        public java.security.KeyPair readEncryptedKeyFile(java.io.InputStream in,
                                                  java.lang.String password)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Reads an encrypted key pair from an input stream.

        This method is able to read key files created by OpenSSL.
        Parameters:
        in - The input stream to read.
        password - The password to use.
        Returns:
        The read key pair.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • readEncryptedPrivateKey

        public java.security.PrivateKey readEncryptedPrivateKey(java.io.InputStream in,
                                                        java.lang.String password)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                                        org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException,
                                                        org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCSException
        Reads an encrypted private key (PKCS8) from an input stream.
        Parameters:
        in - The input stream to read.
        password - The password to use.
        Returns:
        The read private key.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException - If the algorithm used for encryption could not be initialized.
        org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCSException - If the parsing of the input failed.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The read certificate.
        Throws:
        java.security.cert.CertificateException - If the certificate can not be read.

        cert - The certificate to export.
        Throws:

      • writePKCS8EncryptedPrivateKey

        public void writePKCS8EncryptedPrivateKey(java.io.OutputStream out,
                                          java.security.PrivateKey key,
                                          java.lang.String password)
                                   throws org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException,
                                          java.io.IOException
        Encrypts the given private key and writes it to the given output stream (PKCS8).

        The encryption is done using the AES-256-algorithm in cipher block chaining mode.
        Parameters:
        out - The output stream to write.
        key - The key to export.
        password - The password used to encrypt the key.
        Throws:
        org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException - If there was an exception initializing the cipher.
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
